---
title: "Carregando dados, Manipulando e Visualizando"
author: "Ricardo Accioly"
date: ' 2025-03-19 '
format:
 html:
    code-link: true
    fig-width: 9
    fig-height: 7
    fig-dpi: 300
knitr:
  opts_chunk: 
    out.width: 90%
    comment: "#>"
execute:
  freeze: auto
---




## Entrada de dados no R

## Carregando dados




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(qcc)
library(tidyverse)
data(pistonrings)
```
:::




## Explorando os dados




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
head(pistonrings)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
#>   diameter sample trial
#> 1   74.030      1  TRUE
#> 2   74.002      1  TRUE
#> 3   74.019      1  TRUE
#> 4   73.992      1  TRUE
#> 5   74.008      1  TRUE
#> 6   73.995      2  TRUE
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(pistonrings)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
#>     diameter         sample        trial        
#>  Min.   :73.97   Min.   : 1.00   Mode :logical  
#>  1st Qu.:74.00   1st Qu.:10.75   FALSE:75       
#>  Median :74.00   Median :20.50   TRUE :125      
#>  Mean   :74.00   Mean   :20.50                  
#>  3rd Qu.:74.01   3rd Qu.:30.25                  
#>  Max.   :74.04   Max.   :40.00
```


:::
:::




## Manipulando os dados




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aneisdepistao <- pistonrings %>% 
  rename(diametro = diameter, amostra = sample, fase1 = trial)
```
:::




## Visualizando - Histograma




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(aneisdepistao, aes(x = diametro)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = round(1+3.322*log10(nrow(aneisdepistao)),0), fill = "blue", color = "black") +
  labs(title = "Histograma dos diâmetros dos anéis de pistão",
       x = "Diâmetro",
       y = "Frequência")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula01A_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Visualizando - Box-Plot




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(aneisdepistao, aes(x = diametro)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Box-Plot dos diâmetros dos anéis de pistão")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula01A_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Visualizando - Gráfico de corrida




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
media <- aneisdepistao %>% filter(fase1==T) %>% group_by(amostra) %>% summarise(media = mean(diametro))

ggplot(media, aes(x = amostra, y = media)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Diâmetro médio dos anéis de pistão",
       x = "Amostra",
       y = "Diâmetro")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula01A_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aneisdepistao %>% filter(fase1==T) %>% ggplot(aes(x = as.factor(amostra), y = diametro)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Box-Plots dos diametros dos anéis de pistão por amostra",
       x = "Amostra",
       y = "Diâmetro")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula01A_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::




## Resumo dos dados




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(datawizard)
describe_distribution(aneisdepistao)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
#> Warning: Can't describe variables of class `logical`.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
#> Variable |  Mean |    SD |   IQR |          Range | Skewness | Kurtosis |   n | n_Missing
#> -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> diametro | 74.00 |  0.01 |  0.02 | [73.97, 74.04] |     0.25 |     0.21 | 200 |         0
#> amostra  | 20.50 | 11.57 | 20.50 |  [1.00, 40.00] |     0.00 |    -1.20 | 200 |         0
```


:::
:::




## Comparando Histograma, Box-Plot e Violino




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(2024)
dados <- data.frame(x=rnorm(10000, 10, 1), y= rep("A",10000))

library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
g1 <- ggplot(dados, aes(x=x)) + geom_histogram()
g2 <- ggplot(dados, aes(x=x)) + geom_boxplot()
g3 <- ggplot(dados, aes(x=x, y=y)) + geom_violin(draw_quantiles = c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75))
g1 / g2 / g3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
#> `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula01A_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=90%}
:::
:::
